title: Calendar Week/Day view toggles don't change display
description: When clicking Week or Day buttons in the Calendar view, the buttons highlight but the calendar grid remains in Month view. The view toggle appears non-functional.
steps_to_reproduce: Observe: Button highlights but calendar still shows month grid
Observe: Same behavior - button highlights but view doesn't change
expected: Calendar should switch to week or day view layout
actual: Month grid remains displayed regardless of which view mode is selected
suggested_fix: Implement conditional rendering based on selected view mode state

changes: Added WeekView component with 7-day time grid (lines 32-131)
Added DayView component with hour-by-hour display (lines 134-208)
Updated render logic to conditionally render view based on viewMode state
